Properties.Name: Author
Properties.Comment: Author - User, who added the file

v8:item.v8:content: User who has added the file
Universal date of the file modification

Properties.Name: CreationDate
Properties.Comment: Date of adding file to the database

v8:item.v8:content: Shows that the file is encrypted

Properties.Name: Changed
Properties.Comment: Author - User, who added the file

v8:item.v8:content: The last user who edited the file

Properties.Name: PictureIndex
Properties.Comment: Index of an icon, corresponding to the file extension, to be displayed in the list

v8:item.v8:content: Shows that the file is digitally signed
Признак того, что файл подписан с помощью ЭП

Properties.Name: PathToFile
Properties.Comment: Additional path to a file on drive (in case if FileStorageType - "on drive")

v8:item.v8:content: Path to the file in volume (service field)
Путь к файлу в томе (служебное поле)
User who is currently editing the file
Пользователь, редактирующий файл в данный момент
Status for text extraction from the file (service field)
Статус извлечения текста из файла (служебное поле)

Properties.Name: TextStorage
Properties.Comment: Text extracted from the file - for full text search

Properties.Name: FileStorageType
Properties.Comment: Where the files are stored - in the base as ValueStorage or in the directory on the drive

v8:item.v8:content: File storage type (in the volume or directly in the system)
Тип хранения файла (в томе или непосредственно в системе)

Properties.Name: FileStorage
Properties.Comment: Service field for exchanging files in DIB

v8:item.v8:content: To whom the certificate is issued
To whom (name, division, and other information) the certificate is issued
Кому выдан сертификат (имя, отдел и др. информация)
Binary data of the signature (service field)
To whom (name, division, and other information) the certificate is issued
Кому выдан сертификат (имя, отдел и др. информация)
